Player History
Drafted in 21st round, 334th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2015, off Kevin Kunio (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/20/2015, off William Woolverton (COL)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/7/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $1,150,000 per year...
Injured on 6/14/2016 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/15/2016 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by St. Louis (C) on 4/1/2017...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 4/26/2017 to a minor league deal...
